page.title: 13Burton Village
page.content:
If you were to visit Burton's village lanes you would be able to pick your own strawberries and raspberries, and sometimes blackberries. We have a small recreation ground with a roundabout, some swings and a slide. For older teenagers there is a youth club, which was opened earlier this year.
Until recently there were only two shops in the village - a newsagent/sweetshop and a sub-post office/grocery. Now we have six shops and two public houses. We have two churches, St.Luke's and the United Reform Church, which face each other across the village green. St. Luke's is our school church, and we go there for services.
